languages.text: "Работа точная, хоть и не самая аккуратная. Кто бы это ни сделал, он ясно понимал, что ищет и куда нужно бить. Только посмотрите на края пролома, шерин — их точно разворотило направленным взрывом".

"The work is precise, though not the neatest. Whoever did this clearly knew what they were looking for and where to strike. Just look at the edges of the breach, shereen — they were definitely ripped apart by a targeted blast."
languages.original_text: "Работа точная, хоть и не самая аккуратная. Кто бы это ни сделал, он ясно понимал, что ищет и куда нужно бить. Только посмотрите на края пролома, шерин — их точно разворотило направленным взрывом".

traits.locale_text: "The work is precise, though not the neatest. Whoever did this clearly knew what they were looking for and where to strike. Just look at the edges of the breach, shereen — they were definitely ripped apart by a targeted blast."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The work is precise, though not the neatest. Whoever did this clearly knew what they were looking for and where to strike. Just look at the edges of the breach, shereen — they were definitely ripped apart by a targeted blast."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The work is precise, though not the neatest. Whoever did this clearly knew what they were looking for and where to strike. Just look at the edges of the breach, shereen — they were definitely ripped apart by a targeted blast."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The work is precise, though not the neatest. Whoever did this clearly knew what they were looking for and where to strike. Just look at the edges of the breach, shereen — they were definitely ripped apart by a targeted blast."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「仕事は正確だけど、手口は鮮やかとは言えないね。探し物と狙うべき場所を、明らかに知ってた。裂け目の端を見て、シャリーン…狙いを定めた爆発でバラバラになってるのは間違いないよ」
languages.original_text: "The work is precise, though not the neatest. Whoever did this clearly knew what they were looking for and where to strike. Just look at the edges of the breach, shereen — they were definitely ripped apart by a targeted blast."

traits.locale_text: 「仕事は正確だけど、手口は鮮やかとは言えないね。探し物と狙うべき場所を、明らかに知ってた。裂け目の端を見て、シャリーン…狙いを定めた爆発でバラバラになってるのは間違いないよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “虽然不算特别精细，但下手很利落。虽然不知道是谁干的，但那群人知道该找什么，也知道该从哪里下手。看看裂口的边缘吧，亲爱的。很显然，这是用定向爆破炸开的。”
languages.original_text: "The work is precise, though not the neatest. Whoever did this clearly knew what they were looking for and where to strike. Just look at the edges of the breach, shereen — they were definitely ripped apart by a targeted blast."

traits.locale_text: “虽然不算特别精细，但下手很利落。虽然不知道是谁干的，但那群人知道该找什么，也知道该从哪里下手。看看裂口的边缘吧，亲爱的。很显然，这是用定向爆破炸开的。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Le travail est précis, même s'il n'est pas des plus propres. La personne qui a fait cela savait ce qu'elle cherchait et où frapper. Regardez donc les bords du trou, shereen... C'est sans aucun doute le résultat d'une explosion ciblée. »
languages.original_text: "The work is precise, though not the neatest. Whoever did this clearly knew what they were looking for and where to strike. Just look at the edges of the breach, shereen — they were definitely ripped apart by a targeted blast."

traits.locale_text: « Le travail est précis, même s'il n'est pas des plus propres. La personne qui a fait cela savait ce qu'elle cherchait et où frapper. Regardez donc les bords du trou, shereen... C’est sans aucun doute le résultat d’une explosion ciblée. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Un acabado preciso, aunque de pulcritud va justito. Quienquiera que hiciera esto claramente sabía lo que estaba buscando y dónde atacar. No hay más que ver los bordes de la grieta, shereen; esto es de una explosión controlada sí o sí».
languages.original_text: "The work is precise, though not the neatest. Whoever did this clearly knew what they were looking for and where to strike. Just look at the edges of the breach, shereen — they were definitely ripped apart by a targeted blast."

traits.locale_text: «Un acabado preciso, aunque de pulcritud va justito. Quienquiera que hiciera esto claramente sabía lo que estaba buscando y dónde atacar. No hay más que ver los bordes de la grieta, shereen; esto es de una explosión controlada sí o sí».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Die Arbeit ist präzise, aber nicht sonderlich elegant. Da wusste jemand, was er suchte und wohin er schießen muss. Seht Euch nur die Ränder der Bresche an, Shereen ... sie wurden eindeutig von einer gezielten Explosion getroffen."
languages.original_text: "The work is precise, though not the neatest. Whoever did this clearly knew what they were looking for and where to strike. Just look at the edges of the breach, shereen — they were definitely ripped apart by a targeted blast."

traits.locale_text: "Die Arbeit ist präzise, aber nicht sonderlich elegant. Da wusste jemand, was er suchte und wohin er schießen muss. Seht Euch nur die Ränder der Bresche an, Shereen ... sie wurden eindeutig von einer gezielten Explosion getroffen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "İşçilik nizami ama pek temiz değil. Ne aradıklarını ve nerede bulacaklarını iyi biliyorlarmış, artık kimlerin işiyse. Deliğin kenarlarına baksana şirinim. Rastgele bir atışla olacak şey değil bu."
languages.original_text: "The work is precise, though not the neatest. Whoever did this clearly knew what they were looking for and where to strike. Just look at the edges of the breach, shereen — they were definitely ripped apart by a targeted blast."
